comments.body: cc @stbof Here we are documenting MLflow system tags. We are currently planning on putting them in the REST API documentation as part of `RunTag`. Any thoughts on this location, or places where we should link to these? (Also any comments on the docs themselves?)
@aarondav I think there should be a link from Set Tag to the list of disallowed tag keys.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1030,1034 @@+------------+------------+----------------+

Tag keys that start with ``mlflow.`` are reserved for internal use. The following tags are set
automatically by MLflow:
